products.name: Eternal Bloom
products.description: A floral bouquet of jasmine and rose with a hint of citrus. Perfect for daytime elegance.

products.name: Midnight Ember
products.description: A rich and smoky scent with notes of oud, amber, and sandalwood. Ideal for evening wear.

products.name: Citrus Whisper
products.description: A refreshing blend of lemon, bergamot, and mint. Light and energizing.

products.name: Velvet Musk
products.description: Soft musk intertwined with hints of vanilla and white florals.

products.name: Ocean Drift
products.description: A crisp aquatic fragrance with marine notes and a touch of driftwood.

products.name: Spiced Horizon
products.description: An exotic blend of spices, cardamom, and warm amber. Bold and mysterious.

products.name: Petal Rain
products.description: Light and airy with notes of peony, lily, and fresh rain.

products.name: Woodland Spirit
products.description: Earthy tones of cedarwood, pine, and patchouli create a natural, grounding scent.

products.name: Golden Hour
products.description: Warm and glowing scent with honey, vanilla, and a hint of spice.

products.name: Urban Edge
products.description: Modern and sharp with citrus top notes and a leather base.
